thread.title: PM Hasina's official visit to India in April
thread.title_full: PM Hasina's official visit to India in April

title: PM Hasina's official visit to India in April
text:
PM Hasina's official visit to India in April Senior Correspondent, bdnews24.com Published: 2017-02-23 18:22:12.0 BdST Updated: 2017-02-23 18:22:12.0 BdST Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina will go on an official tour of India in April. 
The statement was made on Thursday after visiting Indian Foreign Secretary S Jaishankar met with Hasina at her office in Parliament. "The prime minister will go to India in April," Deputy Press Secretary M Nazrul Islam told the media after the meeting. During his Dhaka visit in 2015, Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi extended an invitation to Hasina. The visit was scheduled for December 2016, but was later postponed. During India's State Minister for External Affairs MJ Akbar's Dhaka visit in December, PMO officials had hinted the visit might take place in February, but that did not take place. Hasina and Modi, however, held a bilateral meeting in October last year in the sidelines of the BRICS-BIMSTEC Outreach Meeting in India's Goa.
